com.nalinstudios.iscan.extras

Class ScanProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.ContentProvider
      • android.provider.DocumentsProvider
        • com.nalinstudios.iscan.extras.ScanProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2

    public class ScanProvider
extends android.provider.DocumentsProvider
    Manages documents and exposes them to the Android system for sharing.
    Author:
    Nalin Angrish.
